item.title: Help i cant find what i miss!
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

as the title says… im on 508.

if i talk with Defence i get the cape from defece and thiev.
if i talk with thieving i get the cape from defece.

case 22: //Thieving master
if (p.skillLvl[17] >= 99) {
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2270, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Martin Thwait”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Congratulations! with your Thieving skillcape!”, 241, 4);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9779, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9777, 1);
}else{
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2270, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Martin Thwait”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “You need 99 Thieving to get Thieving skillcape!”, 241, 4);
break;
}

case 23: // Defence master
if (p.skillLvl[1] >= 99) {
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 705, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Melee Tutor”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Congratulations! with your Defence skillcape!”, 241, 4);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9755, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9753, 1);
}else{
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 705, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Melee Tutor”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Oh come back then you have 99 Defence!”, 241, 4);
break;
}
